(2,): As a system administrator, I want to set up logging, so that I can monitor and troubleshoot system activities effectively As a system administrator, I want to add new validation rules, so that I can adapt to changing requirements
(1,): As a developer, I want to define enumeration types for publish status, submission types, and action types, so that I can standardize and restrict possible values in the system As a developer, I want to encapsulate related functionality in services (SubmissionService, UIEditor, DataService), so that the code remains organized and maintainable
(5,): As a validator, I want to define validation rules with descriptions and error messages, so that I can ensure data quality and consistency
(0,): As a system, I want to validate submissions against predefined rules, so that I can catch errors before publication
(4,): As a UI designer, I want to create new design versions for pages, so that I can iterate on user interfaces As a UI designer, I want to submit designs for approval, so that they can be reviewed and deployed
(3,): As a data manager, I want to process data deletions for specific dates, so that I can maintain data hygiene As a data consumer, I want to get published files by submission type, so that I can access relevant data efficiently
